duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide live video therapy sessions using evidenced-based approaches to adults with emotional disorders.
Collaborate with psychiatric providers to support comprehensive treatment and fellow therapists within the community.
Conduct self-assessments and adjust treatment plans based on progress measures.
Maintain timely clinical documentation through a user-friendly therapist portal.
Receive support and consultation from the Therapy Leadership Team.
Integrate digital solutions into clinical practice.

education_certification.credential: Master’s or doctorate degree in clinical psychology, counseling, or clinical social work from an accredited program.
Independent state license as a Therapist, Counselor, or Psychologist for at least 1 year.
